thread.title: Ride Along on MTB's Massive 'Rhythm' Mega Trail
thread.title_full: Ride Along on MTB's Massive 'Rhythm' Mega Trail

title: Ride Along on MTB's Massive 'Rhythm' Mega Trail
text:
Ride Along on MTB's Massive 'Rhythm' Mega Trail Take a free ride of Rhythm's super jump trail with Rheeder, Vanderham and van Steenbergen. Rhythm: Rheeder, Vanderham and van Steenbergen © Harrison Mendel/Red Bull By Scott Hart on 4 January 2017 
"Riding this trail is unreal," says Bas van Steenbergen , mastermind of the Rhythm course and project — see Rhythm in 4K ultra-high-definition video on YouTube . 
Created exclusively for filming Rhythm , this super trail won't be open to the public until Big White begins bike park operations in Spring 2017 — but you can take a pre-run right now. 
Jump onboard with van Steenbergen, Thomas Vanderham and Brett Rheeder as they freight train down the high-speed run over enormous hips, rollers, jumps and berms. Watch the POV video below
